Articles.Content:
So I've noticed it happen a few times on here, and it happened again just yesterday to one of my threads. You can have nothing but positive feedback in the thread itself, but the thread as a whole can show up as 'one star' putting other people off because only one person decided they didn't like it.

I'd suggest simply not displaying thread ratings until at least three people have voted on it to get a more balanced view.

edit: just noticed it applies to all forums, not just the suggestion one. Can't edit title.

Edited July 2, 2014 by Winter Man
